events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on highway 24 during heavy traffic.
Claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to keywords found in the report.
An insurance agent with expertise in auto claims has been assigned to manage this case.
Customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and provide initial guidance.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents including official police report and vehicle damage photos.
Internal investigation was initiated to verify details of the car accident and assess damage claims.
Investigation confirmed claimantâ€™s account and verified extent of vehicle damage and third-party involvement.
Proposed a settlement offer covering repair costs and compensation for transportation during repairs.
Customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and quick resolution.
Claim has been officially approved following customer agreement to the settlement terms.
Insurance payment was issued promptly to cover the damage repair and related expenses.
Claim has been closed after successful payment and resolution of all claim-related issues.
